body_html:
A) use the zero_state function on the cell object

B) for an rnn, all time steps share weights. We use one matrix to keep all gate weights. Split by column into 4 parts to get the 4 gate weight matrices.

C) StackOverflow is a better place to ask.

B) for an rnn, all time steps share weights.  We use one matrix to keep all gate weights.  Split by column into 4 parts to get the 4 gate weight matrices.
C) StackOverflow is a better place to ask.
body:
A) use the zero_state function on the cell object

B) for an rnn, all time steps share weights.  We use one matrix to keep all gate weights.  Split by column into 4 parts to get the 4 gate weight matrices.

C) StackOverflow is a better place to ask.
